<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk assign workpackage to tickets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/assign-workpackage"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assigns a work package to multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Work packages group related tickets for project management and tracking.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.
2. **Workpackage** – Identify or create the work package to assign.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → collect `TicketId` array
2. Get workpackage: List available workpackages or create a new one
3. Bulk assign: POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/assign-workpackage with ticket IDs and workpackage details

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/workpackages](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) – List work packages

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for bulk assigning a work package to tickets.","properties":{"TicketIds":{"type":"array","description":"Array of ticket identifiers to work.","properties":{"WorkpackageId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Work package identifier.","example":"44444444-4444-4444-8444-444444444444"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier that owns the work package.","example":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier that owns the work package.","example":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010"},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the work package was created."},"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier that created or owns the work package.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Work package name.","example":"IncidentIQ Demo High School Chromebook Rollout"},"IsSaved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the work package is saved.","example":true},"IsComplete":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the work package is marked complete.","example":false},"TotalTickets":{"type":"integer","description":"Total tickets in the work package.","example":10},"MaxPriority":{"type":"integer","description":"Maximum priority score among tickets.","example":200},"ClosedTickets":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of closed tickets in the work package.","example":2},"PercentComplete":{"type":"number","format":"float","description":"Percent completion value.","example":20},"Tickets":{"type":"array","description":"Optional embedded tickets list.","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Ticket entry inside a work package.","properties":{"WorkpackageId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Work package
